author: jgm
content:
Seeing something that I think is a little odd on holesky, but I've never looked at this bit of the spec in detail so wanted to check with others.

Slots 1155102, 1155103 and 1155104 have ETH1 data votes with the same block hash but different deposit roots and deposit counts.  I thought that if blocks had the same block root then they should also have the same deposit root.  Or am I wrong?

author: ajsutton
content: Yeah at any given eth1 block there is only one valid deposit root and count.  Some validator(s) has managed to screw up its local copy of the merkle trie - possibly by starting from a deposit tree snapshot that was wrong or from the wrong chain etc.
